components.template:
{{.Asset.Symbol}}
{{.Asset.Name}}
Price
{{format_float .Asset.PriceUsd}} $
Change24hr
{{price_change .Asset.ChangePercent24Hr}}
MarketCap
{{format_float .Asset.MarketCapUsd}} $
Volume
{{format_float .Asset.VolumeUsd24Hr}} $

components.style: .chart.melt-ComponentsOverview{height:400px;max-width:100%}.overview.melt-ComponentsOverview{flex-direction:column;justify-items:center;display:flex;gap:12px;min-width:600px;width:45vw;padding:12px;border:solid var(--color) 2px;border-radius:.75rem}button.melt-ComponentsOverview{padding:12px;border-radius:.75rem;font-weight:bolder;width:60px;height:40px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;background-color:var(--background-color);border:solid var(--color) 2px;color:var(--color)}button:hover{background-color:var(--color);color:var(--background-color)}.info.melt-ComponentsOverview{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;width:fit-content}.name.melt-ComponentsOverview{font-weight:bold;display:flex;align-items:center}.sell.melt-ComponentsOverview{color:var(--red);border:solid var(--red) 2px}.name .symbol.melt-ComponentsOverview{padding-right:12px;font-size:36px}.sell:hover{background-color:var(--red);color:var(--background-color)}.buy:hover{background-color:var(--blue);color:var(--background-color)}text.highcharts-credits{display:none !important}@media screen and (max-width: 600px){.overview.melt-ComponentsOverview{min-width:unset;width:100%}}.price.melt-ComponentsOverview{color:var(--purple)}.buy.melt-ComponentsOverview{color:var(--blue);border:solid var(--blue) 2px}
components.name: ComponentsOverview

roots.template:
<!DOCTYPE html><html><head>

		<meta charset="UTF-8"/>
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<title>monkey</title>

		<link rel="stylesheet" href="/style.css"/>
		<style>
			@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono&display=swap');
			
			* {
    			font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
    			box-sizing: border-box;
			}

			html {
				width: 100%;
			}

			:root {
				--color: #e4e4e4;
				--background-color: #131313;
			}

			body {
				color: var(--color);
				background-color: var(--background-color);
			}

		</style>
	</head>

	<body>
		{{ html .Body }}
	
</body></html>
